original_title: Railways team to expedite repairs and minimize disruptions during Christmas
original_body_lines: Railway Spokesperson  N.J. Idipola responding swiftly to a train derailment on the upcountry route said that the Railway Department has mobilized a dedicated team to expedite repairs and minimize disruptions during the festive season.
The derailment, attributed to recent heavy rainfall and landslides in the area, is receiving top priority to ensure swift track restoration.
Additionally, Idipola emphasized that passenger comfort remains paramount, and necessary facilities will be provided to manage any inconveniences caused by the incident.
